Reviews.Title: good product by price
Reviews.Author: Emilio De Lemos
Reviews.Content: colors and brilliance as aceptable for the range price, IR leds function good, the adjust bottons not have the sensitive movement for clear images of focus and zoom

Reviews.Title: Meets its intended purpose
Reviews.Author: Mario Morales
Reviews.Content: I gave these only 3 stars because I purchased 3 and each one acted a little different. I like the adjustment screw but it seems like it’s going to brake before you get it to the desired view. Although the picture was nice I switched the camera out and the second one looked a litter clearer. I would recommend this camera for someone that needs a general view, if you’re looking for precision keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Great dome camera
Reviews.Author: RICH MILLER
Reviews.Content: This is a great color dome IR camera for the price, we have ordered others at a higher price and they didn't preform any better!
